Work to do for the current release

This file is intended to collect ideas, problems and work to do with the current Turbine code.

Work to do for the current release

No current items.

Stuff that needs to be looked into (current release or next release)

  • Googlezation of URLs (See here)
  • Make sure that pull tools get refreshed correctly under all circumstances
  • Check lifetimes of authorized and session tools if the application is not the standard login-logout application
  • Move AvalonComponentService to the Fortress container (suggested by the avalon-dev list)

Blue Skying for future Turbine releases

  • Move forward to a component based architecture (avalonization) (partly done!)
  • Decouple the code base into core, components and toolbox
